General.Name: Gogoro Equity Warrant Exp 4th April 2027
General.Description: Gogoro Inc. engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale, and distribution of electric scooters and electric scooter enabling components in Taiwan and internationally. Its electric scooters portfolio includes Gogoro SuperSport, Gogoro S1, Gogoro 2 Series, Gogoro VIVA XL, Gogoro VIVA MIX, and Gogoro VIVA. The company also offers battery swapping solutions. Gogoro Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 225, Chang?an East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 105
